content.webTitle: CD: New Young Pony Club, Fantastic Playroom

fields.headline: New Young Pony Club, Fantastic Playroom
fields.bodyText: That New Young Pony Club appeared on the NME rave tour is reason enough to cast doubt on the whole 'movement'. Aside from the intro of the opener, 'Get Lucky', the debut by the Tahita Bulmer-led quintet owes markedly more to disco-punk trailblazers ESG than any serotonin-starved fluorescent adolescents. Twitchy, energising and frequently filthy, tracks such as 'Jerk Me', 'Get Lucky' and 'Ice Cream' fuse the whiplash rhythms of the aforementioned group with a spiky pop sensibility, suggesting that NYPC are too canny to align themselves with any spurious, short-lived sound.
